name: Europe Royale
description:
This is a game where you can ether push the random button to randomly make a country fall or write in a country name and then push random to make a specific country fall, and have their neighbors annex the closest provinces to them 

Needed to name Bosnia and Herzegovina just Bosnia to make it work and North Macedonia just Macedonia, all country names have their first letter capitalized except the UK wich has both capitalized.

also there is a leaderboard and turn counter, so you can use those to keep track to try to get one nation as big as possible on as few turns as possible

this game is inspired by youtube series from geo facts, 

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCmdhBdB4OUJ820bdI-QeecA
